subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marian Gaborik reached the 30-goal mark for the seventh time in his N.H.L. career, and Brandon Prust scored the game-winner as the Eastern Conference-leading Rangers won their third straight.
snippet: Marian Gaborik reached the 30-goal mark for the seventh time in his N.H.L. career, and Brandon Prust scored the game-winner as the Eastern Conference-leading Rangers won their third straight.
